From: Shant Daldalian <Shant.Daldalian@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Monday, March 3, 2025 9:22 AM
To: Ramez Zebdie <Ramez.Zebdie@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>; Mahmoud Abd Hamid <Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>; Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>; Pierre BAA SOLO <Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Mohamed Rauf <Mohamed.Rauf@chalhoub.com>; Ghouse Khan <Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>; Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>; Joseph Diaz <Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>; Rizaldy Amada <Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>; Israr Malik <Israr.Malik@chalhoub.com>; Praveen Kamalakshan <Praveen.Kamalakshan@chalhoub.com>; Bipin Madhavan Madassery <Bipin.Madassery@chalhoub.com>; Lorena Dimaala <Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>; Clive Godinho <Clive.Godinho@thedealoutlet.com>; Vivek Bhosle <Vivek.Bhosle@chalhoub.com>

Subject: RE: Staff Sale UAE - The Deal Sale in D3

 

Dear all,

 

Taking a moment to thank each one of you for the outstanding support shown before and during the sale event last week. With your support we managed to break another record in sales.

 

Looking forward to another successful event in 2025.

 

Best regards,   

 

SHANT DALDALIAN​​​​
